name: Worley Catastrophe Response
overview:
Worley Catastrophe Response knows that emergency contingency planning can make all the difference in times of crisis. For more than 35 years, the diversified risk management company has demonstrated the importance of preparing for the worst. No matter when disaster strikes or what kind of havoc it wreaks, Worley Catastrophe Response’s team of highly trained professionals is ready to deploy to the incident location and facilitate the recovery.

One of Worley’s most critical tasks falls to its operations department, which is responsible for identifying deployment requisites for specific situations. Its staff members must determine how to appropriately manage its personnel, who include 1,000 on-site field operations workers in addition to 3,000 standby employees. Creating suitable catastrophe response teams is vital to ensuring that clients will have the necessary resources and expertise available to them when they need it most. Deciding whom to send depends largely on the situation. The Worley Catastrophe Response team is made up of a variety of crisis operations experts, such as catastrophe managers and loss adjustment specialists. These individuals are trained to respond to weather-related natural disasters as well as environmental emergencies brought on by man.

Since the devastation wreaked by Hurricane Andrew in 1992, Worley has aided in the claims processing of every hurricane landfall. Even when Hurricane Katrina destroyed the company’s facilities in Hammond, Louisiana, the dedicated team still maintained continuous response services in the aftermath of a storm that cost the country more than any other natural disaster in history. In the wake of the calamity, Worley Catastrophe Response provided invaluable support to some of the United States’ leading insurance companies by supplying them with claims managers, loss adjustment specialists, IT infrastructure, field adjusters, and other support service professionals.

To learn more about the firm’s services, please visit www.worleyco.com.
